name: Convergence Point
description:
Made by team "Three Amigos".

Convergence Point is a first person walk-through experience game produced in Unreal Engine 4. Set in the ruins of old earth submerged underwater, the game focuses on exploration and discovery of the environment, revealing clues of the narrative.

The player plays as an exploration robot who is tasked by a scientist who goes by the name of Dr. Jack Porter, to investigate and search for clues near the Bermuda Triangle in hopes of finding out what happened to Dr. Jack Porter's father.
